channel.title: Compiler help
channel.description:
hi im using a tutorial thats coding but i need help compiling the batch file
heres the link im usin
http://silabsoft.org/smf/index.php?topic=415.0
after youv'e seen it if done the stuff
Ex... i made a new folder called "math.java" and in that folder is a folder called test.bat and the btach file is called coder.bat which is in "test.bat with the notepad with string[]
but i need help running it and compiling it this is the code im currently usin for the code
also i need a run code and a compiler code
this is the code im usin
[code] :menu echo off cls title menu echo.
set /p variable= if %variable%==c goto compile if %variable%==exit goto exit if %variable%==r goto run if %variable%==E goto menu
:run cls title runing server java name of file //java math pause
:compile title Compiler cls "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac" *.java pause goto menu
[/code]

item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @weaving8 weaving8
item.description:
@weaving8 wrote:

hi im using a tutorial thats coding but i need help compiling the batch file

heres the link im usin

http://silabsoft.org/smf/index.php?topic=415.0

after youv’e seen it if done the stuff

Ex… i made a new folder called “math.java” and in that folder is a folder called test.bat and the btach file is called coder.bat which is in "test.bat with the notepad with string[]

but i need help running it and compiling it this is the code im currently usin for the code

also i need a run code and a compiler code

this is the code im usin

:menu
echo off
cls
title menu
echo.

set /p variable=
if %variable%==c goto compile
if %variable%==exit goto exit
if %variable%==r goto run
if %variable%==E goto menu

:run
cls
title runing server
java name of file
//java math
pause

:compile
title Compiler
cls
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac" *.java
pause
goto menu

Read full topic
